title: BAClib Type Definition
description: This schema defines a top-level BAClib data type. Types defined here can be referenced and reused in other schemas.

alias.description: An optional alternative name for the type.

name.description: The unique name of the type being defined.

description.description: A human-readable description of the type.

type.description: A reference to a type, either as a type name or as a set of type traits.
